custom_css: .collection {/* Rounded corners for the entire featured collection */ /* border-radius: 20px; */ overflow: hidden; padding: 20px; background-color: #f5f5f5;}
.collection .card-wrapper {/* Rounded corners for the product cards */ border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden;}
.collection .card__media {/* Rounded corners for product images - ALL corners */ border-radius: 10px; /* Round all corners of the image container */}
